Class Environment

java.lang.Object
  Environment

public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object

An environment is a superclass of concrete classes that act as containers for items in various games. All it provides is a size and a DEFAULT_SIZE (5), and a print method.

Version:
assign3
Author:
babak
